add_library(amd_ags SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_property(TARGET amd_ags PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/amd_ags_x64.lib)

file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/amd_ags_x64.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG})
file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/amd_ags_x64.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE})
